activities: CQR Inc receives personal information to provide Information Security Services to its clients. Services include Information Security Management Systems, Risk Management, Business Continuity Management, Business Impact Analysis, Information Classification, Incident Management Program advice and guidance as well as a number of technical services, such as Penetration testing, vulnerability assessments, architecture reviews and forensic and incident response programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
